partnerTableAirlines.note: Between Taiwan and Mainland China only

changeFee.tooltipText: For China domestic flights if changing before 24h of deperature
For China domestic flights if changing within 24h of deperature, and for international/Hong Kong/Macau/Taiwan flights if changing before 24h of deperature
